definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: It will be a case of introducing this gently as there is a risk of alienating the public majority.
sentences.chinese: 這將會和緩地推出，因有疏離大部分民衆的風險。

sentences.english: He joins the Communist Party and gets involved in local politics, growing more distant from his family.
sentences.chinese: 入黨後的他開始參與政治活動，與家人逐漸疏離。

sentences.english: Alienation is a central motif in her novels.
sentences.chinese: 疏離感是她小說的一個重要的主題。

sentences.english: Moreover, Imam Sa's Quotations also alienates from Nietzsche's thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它又對尼采的思想與創作構思有所疏離。

sentences.english: Go for healing the big dissociations today.
However, a sense of alienation followed me through my first year.
sentences.chinese: 然而，大學第一年我始終有種疏離感。

sentences.english: In mirror's you said the wish to be warm, realistic person actually alone love alienation.
sentences.chinese: 鏡子裏的你說想要溫暖，現實的人卻獨愛疏離感。

sentences.english: Outsider, she alienated a low-key, lofty, persist in one's old ways.
sentences.chinese: 外人眼裏，她疏離低調，冷傲清高，我行我素。

sentences.english: The self-esteem is the main factor effecting the sense of alienation.
sentences.chinese: 自尊是影響高中生疏離感的重要因素。

sentences.english: As devotion unites lovers, perfidy estranges friends.
sentences.chinese: 忠心團結愛人，背信棄義疏離朋友。

sentences.english: The inflexible purity of Socrates and his atopia are correlative.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格拉底的擇善固執跟他的疏離感是息息相關的。

definition: to drift apart/to become estranged/to alienate/estrangement
to be fondly attached to/to not wish to part with/to cling to
to remove/to step back from involvement/to disengage
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
character acquired through long habit/habits and properties
